key_risks: Regulatory and compliance risks due to SEC charges and Federal Reserve penalties
Cybersecurity vulnerabilities from reliance on digital platforms and third-party providers
Legal and financial liabilities from class-action lawsuits and fines
Dependence on fintech partnerships subject to regulatory and operational risks
controversies: SEC charges for improper valuations and violations of the Securities Exchange Act
Federal Reserve penalties for failing to manage risks in fintech partnerships
Flagstar Bancorp data breach exposing customer data and misleading investors
Involvement in multiple class-action lawsuits alleging securities law violations
social_issues: Data breaches impacting customer trust and privacy
governance_issues: Breaches of fiduciary duty in class-action lawsuits
